properties.Location: 3361 S. Signal Butte Road  Fire Station 219
properties.Describe: Fire station that includes the following sustainable features: Water efficiency efforts, onsite renewable energy, recycled content materials and low emitting features.  Certified in 2013.

properties.Location: Fire Station 220  5763 E Main St. Mesa  AZ 85205
properties.Describe: Fire station that includes the following sustainable features:  stormwater considerations, cool roof, water efficiency efforts, energy efficiency efforts, and recycled content materials. Certified in 2013.

The Superstition Springs Transit Center features the following sustainable features: Urban heat island effect consideration and cooling features, as well as integration into the desert landscape. Completed 2009.
